title: sellmybit
author: sellmybit
created_time: June 17, 2022, 09:55:13 PMLast edit: July 08, 2022, 12:59:00 AM by sellmybit
content: The miner is fully functional and have the Hiveon firmware.If you want a photo or a video of the miner on work send me a pm.The price is of 450€ without shipping fees but the BITMAIN PSU is included.For the payment I want it in bitcoin.If you want to use escrow you are welcome.Shipped from ITALY.

comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: do you have photos of the equipment?

comments.author: sellmybit
comments.body: Quote from: Papillion on July 07, 2022, 03:02:21 AMdo you have photos of the equipment?Yes of course, send me your preferred contact info by pm and I send you the photos of equipment.

comments.body: Quote from: sellmybit on July 07, 2022, 10:52:49 AMQuote from: Papillion on July 07, 2022, 03:02:21 AMdo you have photos of the equipment?Yes of course, send me your preferred contact info by pm and I send you the photos of equipment.You should upload/link them here. That way users dont have to message you directly now or in the future.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: price might be a bit high - back when LTC was around 60 - 70 USD per coin - I was paying 100-110 per L3, now LTC is less than $60 per coin and your price is 450.

comments.author: sellmybit
comments.body: Price updated to 80€ without shipping feesI ship worldwide.
